Actions.Name: Create tiIndicator
Actions.Description: Create a new threat intelligence indicator by posting to the tiIndicators collection.

Actions.Name: Delete subscriptions
Actions.Description: Delete the specific Microsoft Graph Webhook subscription.

Actions.Name: Delete tiIndicator by ID
Actions.Description: Delete a threat intelligence indicator corresponding to the specified ID.

Actions.Name: Delete multiple tiIndicators by IDs
Actions.Description: Delete multiple threat intelligence indicators corresponding to the specified IDs.

Actions.Name: Delete multiple tiIndicators by external IDs
Actions.Description: Delete multiple threat intelligence indicators corresponding to the specified external IDs.

Actions.Name: Get active subscriptions
Actions.Description: Get the list of unexpired subscriptions for this Azure Active Directory tenant.

Actions.Name: Get alert by ID
Actions.Description: Get a security alert corresponding to the specified ID.

Actions.Name: Get alerts
Actions.Description: Get a list of security alerts for this Azure Active Directory tenant. Use with different query parameters.

Actions.Name: Get tiIndicator by ID
Actions.Description: Get a threat intelligence indicator corresponding to the specified ID.

Actions.Name: Get tiIndicators
Actions.Description: Get a list of threat intelligence indicators for this Azure Active Directory tenant. Use with different query parameters.

Actions.Name: On new high severity alerts
Actions.Description: Triggers on new high severity alerts

Actions.Name: Submit multiple tiIndicators
Actions.Description: Create new threat intelligence indicators by posting a tiIndicators collection. Required fields for each tiIndicator are: action, azureTenantId, description, expirationDateTime, targetProduct, threatType, tlpLevel.

Actions.Name: Update alert
Actions.Description: Update specific properties of a security alert.

Actions.Name: Update subscription
Actions.Description: Renew a Microsoft Graph webhook subscription by updating its expiration time.

Actions.Name: Update tiIndicator
Actions.Description: Update specific properties of a threat intelligence indicator. Required fields for the tiIndicator are: Id, expirationDateTime, and targetProduct.

Actions.Name: Update multiple tiIndicators
Actions.Description: Update specific properties of multiple threat intelligence indicators. Required fields for each tiIndicator are: Id, expirationDateTime, and targetProduct.
